text: Mohammed Sanusi Barkindo (20 April 1959 â€“ 5 July 2022) was a Nigerian politician. From 1 August 2016 until his death, he was the Secretary General of OPEC. Barkindo died on 5 July 2022 in Abuja, Nigeria from a heart attack at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Secretaries General of OPEC Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Mohammed Barkindo
